description:
Retro silhouette + modern tech. Cutting-edge anti-fog lenses keep your vision clear while you crush it and side shields offer an extra layer of protection .

  • Fits medium faces best
  • Back side of lens embedded with military-grade anti-fog material
  • 3 sizes of rubber nose pads let you dial in the perfect fit
  • Removeable side shields offer an extra measure of protection and a whole new look
  • Anti-slip nose pads and temple tips keep the glasses in place
  • TR90 thermoplastic frames are flexible, durable and light
  • 6-base lens curve offers great coverage
name: Ryders Eyewear Hazel Sunglasses - Women's

specs.key: Visible Light Transmission (Blue XTAL Black/Grey Anti)
Visible Light Transmission (Dk Red Grey/Brown Lens FM)
